channel.title: Help with ham!
channel.description:
Ok, I need to know if I'm doing this right
First, I create my network on HAM Second, I run my server
Once I run my server can other people access that server?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2007, 12:47:23 PM[/size][hr]OK! Scratch that! I need help with HAM period!
I need full instructions on getting my server up. Because I'm a stupid nub! =\ If it says server down to other ppl, does that mean it's because of errors or just becuase HAM is setup right?!?!?!?!

item.title: Help with ham!
